Editor's Notes

Because of the codification of D.C. Law 12-215 as subchapter II of this chapter, the designation of the preexisting text as subchapter I, "subchapter" has been substituted for "chapter" in subsection (a).

sections.text: For each loan issued under this subchapter, the Mayor shall arrange a repayment schedule.
Each loan granted from the fund shall be recorded as a lien against the real and personal property of the applicant.
